thread.title: JetBlue and Seaborne Airlines Launch Codeshare Agreement Throughout the Caribbean
thread.title_full: JetBlue and Seaborne Airlines Launch Codeshare Agreement Throughout the Caribbean

title: JetBlue and Seaborne Airlines Launch Codeshare Agreement Throughout the Caribbean
text:
October 21, 2015 13:15 ET Award-Winning La Vita Neighborhood Announces Final Phase Release, Highlights Magnificent Quick Move-In Opportunity 
IRVINE, CA--(Marketwired - Oct 21, 2015) - The final phase of Brookfield Residential's award-winning La Vita neighborhood at Orchard Hills™ will be released soon, offering buyers the last opportunity to own at one of Irvine's most sought-after addresses. Set within the gated Groves in Orchard Hills™, La Vita is entering its final phase of sales and homebuyers are encouraged to take advantage of the last of the collection's stunning single-family luxury homes, including the magnificent Residence 1BR, Homesite 72, a beautifully upgraded four bedroom, 4.5 bath residence available now. Priced at $1,542,086, this incredible new home opportunity offers a desirable cul-de-sac setting on a 5,096 square foot lot and is within walking distance to Orchard Hills Junior High School. The open interior of this home showcases a gourmet kitchen with adjoining prep kitchen and walk-in pantry, private first floor bedroom suite with walk-in closet, study upgraded with exterior French doors, large great room with upgraded multi-panel pocket doors that access a covered outdoor living room with fireplace, an expansive family retreat area, and an oversized two-car garage with storage. Distinguishing this home is a number of sought-after design elements, including professional-grade Viking ® stainless steel appliances, spectacular center island with seating for four or more, maple-stained shaker-style European cabinetry and Quartz countertops in kitchen; an oversized walk-in shower in master bath; cultured marble in baths two and three; a split-stair system with maple-finish handrail and stair lights; custom flooring and much more. 
Potential buyers have the opportunity to be settled into this particular home in 30 days or less, adding an incredible level of turnkey convenience to this rare offering. 
Those interested in a lifestyle of true exclusivity and prestige are urged to visit the La Vita Sales Gallery today to inquire about Residence 1BR, Homesite 72. For immediate details on the collection, which was honored with two prestigious Gold Awards and three Silver Awards at The Nationals(SM) 2015 ceremony, log on to www.BrookfieldSoCal.com . 
"La Vita is one of the most sought-after addresses in Irvine, which is why the final phase release, and the availability of the spotlight Residence 1BR are opportunities buyers will want to explore as soon as possible," said Mercedes Meserve, Vice President of Marketing for Brookfield. 
Residential Southern California. "Visit the La Vita Sales Gallery soon to experience the lifestyle you and your family deserve." 
Brookfield Residential is renowned for premier homebuilding in the best places to call home, and La Vita is the consummate reflection of that legacy. The extraordinary collection features clusters of individual homes dramatically situated in unique piazzas, where private driveways lead to the homes' Tuscan-inspired exteriors. Four two-story designs are available, all with sweeping, open interiors spanning from approximately 3,400 to 4,000 square feet with soaring, two-story foyer ceilings, 4 to 5 bedroom suites, 4.5 to 5.5 baths, 2-car garages plus storage and exquisitely grand features that accentuate the residences' authentic beauty. Within the flowing interiors, homeowners will enjoy oversized great rooms which lead to an outdoor covered living room with fireplace via bi-fold or multi-slide pocket panel doors; gourmet kitchens designed with prep kitchens and Viking® professional appliance packages and spacious dining rooms to host more formal engagements. La Vita's upper levels offer comfortably large bedrooms with en-suite baths and unique family retreat areas. Customization options are also available. Homes are priced from the mid to high $1 millions. 
Orchard Hills™ is a village so unique, there will never be another opportunity like it in Orange County. A place of such dramatic topography and natural beauty , it is distinguished as a true landmark within the Villages of Irvine ® . Set amidst rare natural beauty, 12 new home neighborhoods offer an impressive range of architectural designs within this extraordinary Irvine address. Rolling hillsides, acres of open space and proximity to working avocado groves highlight the village's rare natural splendor and serenity. Brand new luxury neighborhoods epitomize sophistication and architectural differentiation. 
Created by Irvine Company Community Development, Orchard Hills™ is conveniently located in Irvine, California. In 2014, Money Magazine named Irvine California's No.1 city in its "Best Places to Live" list. The highly acclaimed master-planned community is renowned for allowing residents to enjoy a unique lifestyle unmatched in the region -- some of the best schools in the state; America's safest city for eleven years in a row; abundant open space, parks and recreational opportunities; and world-class dining, entertainment and employment. For more information about the Villages of Irvine, visit www.VillagesofIrvine.com . 
To visit La Vita from I-5, exit Culver Dr. and head east. Cross over Portola Pkwy, make a left on Settlers and proceed through the Groves entry gate. Turn left on Fiddlebow, then left again on Sunset Cove. The guest parking lot is located on your right hand side, past the model homes. The La Vita Sales Gallery and model homes are open daily from 10 a.m. to 6 p.m. and 2 p.m. to 6 p.m. on Wednesdays. For more information, please call 888.331.5915 or visit www.BrookfieldSoCal.com . 
Prices effective date of publication. 
About Brookfield Residential 
Brookfield Residential Southern California (Los Angeles and San Diego) a division of Brookfield Residential, is committed to being more than a homebuilder. We strive to create the best places to call home. The Brookfield Residential Southern California (Los Angeles and San Diego) team has the passion, the expertise and the local knowledge to craft homes and neighborhoods that speak to homebuyers at every stage of life. We are an award-winning homebuilder and industry leader with an exceptional reputation for quality, design, and customer service. 
Brookfield Residential Properties is a leading land developer and homebuilder in North America. We entitle and develop land to create master-planned communities, build and sell lots to third-party builders, and operate our own home building division. We also participate in selected, strategic real estate opportunities, including infill projects, mixed-use developments, and joint ventures. We are the flagship North American residential property company of Brookfield Asset Management, a leading global alternative asset manager with over $200 billion of assets under management. Further information is available at BrookfieldResidential.com or Brookfield.com .
